name: @chillandchat/cli
description: The CLI for communicating with the Chill&chat server.
author: Alvin Cheng <eventide1029@gmail.com>

scripts.build: echo 'Building...' && cp -a ./src/ ./build/tmp && node build.js && tsc && echo 'Done!'
scripts.test: echo 'Compiling test code...' && ts-node ./src/index.ts --compile ./__tests__/main.chat && echo 'Running test code...' && ts-node ./src/index.ts --run ./__tests__/main.out.chat && echo 'Done!'
